code: var url="http://localhost:3000/messages";export var addMessage=function addMessage(message){return{type:"ADDED_MESSAGE",payload:message};};export var setMessages=function setMessages(messages){return{type:"GOT_MESSAGES",payload:messages};};export var fetchMessages=function fetchMessages(){console.log("B");return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:"LOADING"});fetch(url).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(json){dispatch(setMessages(json));console.log("F");});console.log("C");};};export var createMessage=function createMessage(message){return function(dispatch){var configObj={method:'POST',headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json","Accepts":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(message)};fetch(url,configObj).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(json){dispatch(addMessage(json));});};};
